net.fileDownloadFailed: Download failed. You can retry later.

githubAPI.proxyNotFound: Github proxy is removed and has been automatically reverted to the default settings.

pluginManager.needNewerCoreVersion: Plugin "{name}" need higher version Typora Community Plugin. Please check for update.

pluginMarketplace.idNotCorrect: Downloaded plugin "{name}" id is not equal to user install plugin id.

fileLink.name: File & Link
fileLink.openLinkInCurrentWin: Open Markdown links in current window
fileLink.openLinkInCurrentWinDesc: Ctrl(⌘)+Click to open Markdown links will open Markdown file in current window. Enable it better if use File Tabs.
fileLink.mdLinkWithoutExtensionDesc: Markdown link can be used without the extension `.md`, e.g. `[Note](note)` will open `note.md`
fileLink.quickOpenInCurrentWin: Quick open file in current window
fileLink.quickOpenInCurrentWinDesc: Choose file in quick open panel will open Markdown file in current window. Enable it better if use File Tabs.
fileLink.ignoreFileGlob: Ignore folder in quick open panel
fileLink.ignoreFileGlobDesc: Ignore files in folders (seperated by comma) and not show in quick open panel.

appearance.name: Appearance
appearance.showNotSupportedFileDesc: Not supported file will open with default application.
appearance.keepSearchResultDesc: When you switch to another panel (such as "Files") and then switch back to the search panel, you will not lose the recent search results.
appearance.searchResultFullPathDesc: Hover your cursor over the path and it will show full path in a tooltip.
appearance.workspaceDesc: It will disable the Legacy "Show File Tabs" feature. Better to enable "App Setting → General → Save without asking when switch files on side panel"
appearance.fileTabsDesc: Better to enable "App Setting → General → Save without asking when switch files on side panel"
appearance.hideExtensionInFileTabDesc: For example, file tab of "File.md" will be shown as "File".

pluginMarketplace.name: Plugin Marketplace
pluginMarketplace.downloaderDesc:
- Typora: More stable, shows very few error messages;
- Nodejs: Shows more error messages.
pluginMarketplace.githubProxyDesc: Proxy of github for loading plugin list and downloading plugin.
pluginMarketplace.author: Author

about.name: About
about.coreUpToDate: Typora Community Plugin is up to date.
about.coreUpdateSuccessful: Typora Community Plugin update successful. (Need to relaunch Typora)
about.langDesc: Display language of Typora Community Plugin. (Need to relaunch Typora)
